meanings.definition: Distributing or spreading out over a wide area.
meanings.sent1: The dispersing clouds covered the entire sky.
meanings.sent2: The stars in the night sky looked like a dispersing blanket.
meanings.sent3: The dispersing colors of the rainbow made the sky look like a painting.
meanings.sent4: The dispersing leaves on the ground created a colorful carpet.
meanings.sent5: The dispersing fog enveloped the entire town in a mysterious haze.

meanings.definition: Scattering or separating in different directions.
meanings.sent1: The wind was dispersing the leaves all around the yard.
meanings.sent2: The seeds dispersed in the wind, finding new places to grow.
meanings.sent3: The children were dispersing in excitement after the school bell rang.
meanings.sent4: The news of the treasure hunt quickly dispersed throughout the town.
meanings.sent5: The scent of fresh bread was dispersing from the bakery, tempting everyone nearby.
